title: Dreaming in motion picture
creator_credit: Ian RT Colless, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Through music and footage of dance, Ian Colless weaves a tale, of his upbringing as a Gundungurra man, his home in the Blue Mountains and the journey to becoming a dancer. Ian has found a way to combine the various cultures and identities within him through dance, making his body a symbol of reconciliation and giving his people a voice.
